We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private AbsolutePriceOscillator _apo;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_apo = APO(symbol, fastPeriod, slowPeriod, movingAverageType);

// In OnData()
if (_apo.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "APO Fast", _apo.Fast);
    Plot("My Indicators", "APO Slow", _apo.Slow);
    Plot("My Indicators", "APO Signal", _apo.Signal);
    Plot("My Indicators", "APO Histogram", _apo.Histogram);
    Plot("My Indicators", "APO Current", _apo.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.apo = self.APO(symbol, fastPeriod, slowPeriod, movingAverageType)

# In OnData()
if self.apo.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "APO Fast", self.apo.Fast);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "APO Slow", self.apo.Slow);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "APO Signal", self.apo.Signal);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "APO Histogram", self.apo.Histogram);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "APO Current", self.apo.Current);
